feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
